meanings.definition: Attractive or charming in a pretty or endearing way.
meanings.sent1: The puppy looked even cutesier with a bow on its collar.
meanings.sent2: The kitten's fluffy tail made it even cutesier.
meanings.sent3: The baby's giggle was even cutesier than the sound of a bell.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seemed to compete to be the cutesier ones.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's smile was the cutesier of them all.

meanings.definition: To make something more attractive or charming in a pretty or endearing way.
meanings.sent1: She tried to cutesier up the room by adding fairy lights.
meanings.sent2: The artist cutesiered the drawing by adding sparkles.
meanings.sent3: He cutesiered the cake with colorful frosting and sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: The decorator cutesiered the party venue with balloons and ribbons.
meanings.sent5: The children cutesiered up the classroom with handmade decorations.
